===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[nature]]; the [[natural]] [[world]]

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[natural]]; of or relating to [[nature]]
# [[natural]]; [[at ease]]; without [[strain]]

====Usage notes====
To describe things literally produced by nature, use the attributive {{zh-l|天然}} instead.

===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[naturally]]; in a natural manner
# [[naturally]]; [[of course]]; as a matter of course

===Conjunction===
{{zh-con}}

# [[admittedly]]
